abstract.text: RichTextKit helps you view and edit rich text in SwiftUI, UIKit and AppKit.

inlineContent.text: that supports text style (bold, italic, underline, strikethrough etc.), font, font sizes, text and background colors, text alignment, images etc.
RichTextKit can be installed with the Swift Package Manager:
If you prefer to not have external dependencies, you can also just copy the source code into your app.
article has a guide to help you get started with RichTextKit.
